mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message SET regDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, toId = #{toId}, fromId = #{loginedMemberId}, delStatus = 0
mapper.select: SELECT MS.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM message AS MS INNER JOIN member AS M ON MS.toId = M.id AND MS.fromId = M.id WHERE MS.toId = #{loginedMemberId} AND MS.delStatus = 0, AND MS.id >= #{from} ORDER BY MS.id ASC
